content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Lab at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position x)

### Assembling machine at position(y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position y)

### Electricity generator at position(z)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (position a)
- Boiler (position b)
- Offshore pump (position c)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing boiler
- Ensure the target location is clear of obstacles before attempting to place a boiler. 

### Errors related to power supply
- Connect the lab and assembling machine to a power source to ensure they receive the necessary electricity for operation.
